title: The Best Investment I Ever Made Cost Me $20
subtitle: Discover how one book transformed my financial journey and led to millionaire status in my early 40s.
content:
The Best Investment I Ever Made Cost Me $20

If any of this is helpful, check out my new podcast, Your Money Guide on the Side, by clicking the link in my bio.

1. The Book That Changed Everything

When I was 22 years old, I bought Andrew Tobias' The Only Investment Guide You'll Ever Need.

2. A Life-Changing Read

I read it cover to cover. It's sharp, funny, and timeless.

3. Automation and Low-Cost Investing

Because it taught me the importance of automating my investments into low-cost funds in my 20s, I'm now a millionaire in my early 40s.

4. Timeless Advice

And guess what? I just reread the book because I still have my copy. That same advice still holds true today, almost 50 years later.

5. Special Podcast Episode

And guess what else? I just had the honor of interviewing Andrew Tobias on my new podcast. Make sure you tune in to this week's episode of Your Money Guide on the Side by clicking the link in my bio to hear how he continues to guide millions of readers towards simplified and enduring prosperity.
